io.sarl.util

Interface RestrictedAccessEventSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventSpace, Space
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestrictedAccessEventSpaceImpl

    public interface RestrictedAccessEventSpace
extends EventSpace
    Event driven interaction space where agent are register and unregister themselves according to a access restriction. Agents should only register once in this type of space.
    Version:
    0.7.0-SNAPSHOT 2017-10-02 00:10:05
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.util

    • Method Detail

      • register

        def register(entity : EventListener,
             requester : Principal) : Address 
        Registers the entity inside this space. The access to the space is control by access rights. If the requester has not the correct rights, a AccessControlException is thrown.

        After registering a new agent, the Space should emit a MemberJoined event where the source is the address of the newly registered agent.

        If the agent is already registered the address is return, but the listener is not replaced.

        Parameters:
        entity - the event listener to register.
        requester - object that is requesting the access.
        Returns:
        the entity's address in this space
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if the requester has not the right to access to the space.
        Fired Events:
        ParticipantRegistered

      • register

        def register(entity : P) : Address  with <P extends EventListener & Principal>
        Registers the entity inside this space. The access to the space is control by access rights. If the requester has not the correct rights, a AccessControlException is thrown.

        After registering a new agent, the Space should emit a MemberJoined event where the source is the address of the newly registered agent.

        If the agent is already registered the address is return, but the listener is not replaced.

        Type Parameters:
        P - - type of the entity to register.
        Parameters:
        entity - object that is requesting the access.
        Returns:
        the entity's address in this space
        Throws:
        AccessControlException - if the requester has not the right to access to the space.
        Fired Events:
        ParticipantRegistered

      • unregister

        def unregister(entity : EventListener) : Address 
        Unregisters the entity inside this space. Before unregistering an agent, the Space should emit a MemberLeft event where the source is the address of the unregistered agent.
        Parameters:
        entity - the event listener to unregister.
        Returns:
        the former entity's address
        Fired Events:
        ParticipantUnregistered
